name: Battle Trivia Knockout
description:
Battle head-to-head in this fast-paced trivia action game and knock out the competition! Over 1,000 new questions are both presented on screen and spoken by the Trivia Sensei.

Correct answers are only half the battle... take out your opponent’s health points and score a decisive Knockout! Advance through the rounds to become the winner and ultimate Trivia Master!

Play a full length game or any single match from 4 exciting game modes.

1 - 4 players local or play against up to 3 CPU players.

Features
• Over 1000 new questions, each spoken for easy play
• Unique head-to-head battle format
• Chose from 12 Trivia Quiz Fighters to represent you in battle
• Play a full length game or any single match from 4 game modes
• 1 - 4 players local or play against up to 3 CPU players



1-4 players
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output
